price: Imana Allah, ni Yo Rugaba w’ibiri mu majuru n’isi. Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, ni Uwikenuye Yikenuye muri vyose, Nyenugushimwa, Ishimwa ku mazina, ku matazirano no ku bikorwa vyayo mu bihe vyose.
arabic: لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

meta.transliteration: lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
